name: COD4CleanupProf
short_description:
Made by Sonicstream 

E-Mail: tommops@web.de

This Tool is for COD 4 German and English


COD4CleanupProf. clean your original COD 4 Main, Mods and Maps  Folder to the original Install.

COD4CleanupProf. save the clean Files to the Directory COD4clean\ COD4main,Mods and Maps 
                                                                                                         


Version 1.80 Fixed Problem with English main Folder

Have fun .



Readme File:

This Tool is for COD4

With the View Button you can make a look to your COD4 Folders.

With the Clean Buttons you clean the COD4 Folders to original. 

Folders in the main will be not clean.


Have fun .



Version 1.80 Fixed Problem with English main Folder
